1.content: Welcome to the world where Vore rules. Before you get started on your trip into this world, you must pick a gender and Pred/Prey title. From there, play the story out, and see if you'll become a dominate predator or be digested by one. Your choices are as followed.
1.title: The Beginning

11.content:
Pick which Predatory Male you want to be. Your choices are:

Rick: And 18 year-old freshman in college. Rick is a bit rough, but he abides to the rules. He's a jock and often tries to impress the ladies. He is also a powerful pred, digesting his prey ex-girlfriends when they fail to "satisify" him.

Jake: A 13 year-old student who just woke up to find his jaw dislocated. He's excited about becoming a pred, and just got his Blue Star mark. He is inexperienced, and needs to practice his new-found power.

Marcus: A 22 year-old fresh out of college. He's been dating his girlfriend for a while. A nice guy at heart, but stubborn to a fault. His girlfriend is a prey woman, and is often nervous around him. Once he gets set on a target, you can't stop him. Will he end up eating his girl?

Tory: A 27 year-old high school teacher. He teaches history and english. He punishes students who get "3 strikes" with his stomach acids. He also is very strict, and if any student is disobedient during class three times, he will digest them in front of the rest of the class.

Thomas: Thomas, a.k.a. Tommy, is a 16 year-old martial artist. He's bit of a rogue, but still listens to reason. He is the star pupil of a martial art school, and often challenges those to contests. However, when he encounters a prey martial artist, he cuts them a deal. If they win, he won't ever eat them, but if they lose, he can eat them as his prize.
11.title: Predatory Male

112.content:
Jake wakes up one morning. He gets out of his bed tiredly. He looks around his room. He has a computer, TV, and a chair. He yawns, and that is when Jake realizes he has a dislocated jaw. He wonders if he should try and eat something now or go ask his parents for lessons. He also wonders when he will get to meet the "Vore Leaders" if he goes out and eats the first prey he sees, h'll be arrested. And Vorish prison can be very harsh.
Just then the phone rings...
112.title: Jake

1121.content:
Jake walks over to the phone next to his computer.
"Hello?" Jake says as he picks up the phone.
"Yes this is John," John says "I'm with the Vore Leaders. It has come to my attention that you have turned 13 today. You must now come to our headquarters at once to see if you are a pred or a prey. Is your mother or father home right now?"
"Uhh yeah, I think so." Jake replies as he steps out of his room. "Hey is anyone home?" Jake yells while holding the receiver to his chest.
"Yes dear, I'm home" Jake's mother, Sam, yelled from downstairs "What do you need?"
"It's some guy from the Vore Leaders, they want to see if I'm a prey or pred!" Jake yells as he starts going down the steps.
"Okay then, I got the phone, you can hang up now." Sams says. Jake puts the phone to his ear and can hear his mother and John talking. He hangs up the phone.
Few minutes later...
1121.title: Answer it

choices: Skip ahead to the Vore Leader HQ
11211.content:
Jake can hear his mother coming up the stairs.
"Okay then dear, go and take a shower and everything, you have to meet the Vore Leaders by 4:35." Sam says.

(This is him getting ready, doesn't really matter so skip if if you want)

Jake goes over to the bathroom and takes off all his clothes. He turns to the shower, and turns on the water. He goes to feel it. It's really hot, he pulls his hand away. He turns the hot water, and gets into the shower. While he is in the shower he wonders what will happen. Will he get his blue star, or will he get a X for some reason? After a few minutes he is done taking a shower. He hops out of the shower and dries of. He puts a towel around his waist and brushes his teeth. He walks out of the bathroom and goes into this room. He he opens his underpants drawer and pulls out some underpants. He takes off the towel and puts on them. He goes to his wardrobe and look for some pants. He find his "lucky" jeans. He puts them on too. He looks for a good shirt to wear, he knows he's probably gonna have to demonstrate this vorish powers, so he decides to wear a big blue shirt. He fixes up his hair and look at the time, it's 3:00.

(This is the end of him getting ready)

Jake goes downstairs to see that his breakfast is ready, its pancakes, with butter and syrup on top. Theres also some OJ. He wonders if he can scarf it down in one large gulp. He grabs the plate and puts it to his mouth. He opens his mouth as wide as he can. He pushes the entire plate and all into his mouth. He doesn't chew it, he just swallows it whole. He feels happy that he knows that he can gulp things down in one gulp. He just pours the OJ into his mouth too. He wonders if he shouldn't have eaten the plate too.
11211.title: Getting Ready to go

112111.content:
After he has eaten that big meal he goes over the their driveway. His mom is waiting for him. He jumps in.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Skipping~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
His mom pulls up to a large building. Near the top it says "VL" ,it stands for Vore Leaders.
"I'm sorry son, but I'm not allowed to go in with you." Jake's mom says. Jake already knew this. For he learned it in school. Nobody can go with you when you are gonna take our exams.
Jake walks into the large building, he goes over to the receptionist.
"I'm Jake Rolland" Jake says.
"Ah yes, your meeting is in...now!" the receptionist says. She leads Jake to a door, Jake goes right on in. The door closes behind him.
He is now in a large room, there is 4 old men all surrounding him standing at podiums. 2 on each side of the room.
"Greeting Jake. I am Lord Fierce" one of the old men says.
"Yes, you are here to take your Vore exams." another one says.
"Yes, now then let us see your jaw, open wide" Lord Fierce commands. Jake opens his mouth has wide as he possibly can. Jake is amazed at how wide he can open it. The Vore Leaders talk among them selfs.
"Okay then," one of them says "eat that dummy." a dummy of a human is lowered next to him.

Jake then opens his mouth nice and wide, big enough to fit the head in his mouth. With one large gulp Jake is able to fit the dummy in up to his neck. He moans as he takes another gulp. This one is bigger, he gets it down to his waist. With a few more gulps he is able to eat the entire dummy.
"Great, you have passed your exam." Lord Fierce says as he points to a door across the room. "Go through that door to get your blue star." Jake goes over to the door and walks inside.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Skipping~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
After getting his tattoo, he leaves the building. He sees his mom waiting in the parking lot. He holds up his hand and shows his blue star. She cheers for him

choices: Go for some fast food with his mother.

Even though he was 13 and thought of himself as an adult he was surprised that his mother was letting him choose rather than just telling him what they were going to do. But then as a predator he had some real choices to make and would need to get used to it.

He thinks about going for a burger, or maybe three or four given his new abilities. But then he rarely got a day out of school so maybe he could lark around a bit before going home. He might even find something or someone to try your new abilities on as well.

As he watched his mom drive away he thought about what to do and then realised that most of the fun things involved being with his friends who were all in school today.

Thinking about it there were some things that he never got to do and maybe today he could have some extra fun. There was that store down town that he never got a chance to go to or he could annoy the kids in the fancy prep-school who always looked down on him and his mates.

Then again his stomach was rumbling and his mom had given him some money for treats.

He had often had fantasies about eating the girls in this school, especially when they made fun of him which was something they seemed to take great pleasure in. Or he could infiltrate the school and see if he could grab a meal. Now it would be some kudos if his first meal were a girl swallowed in her own school.

Then you noticed the sports fields to the side of the school and realised that these girls were playing soccer by the side of the woods where others in their uniforms doing some sort of nature study. There were also girls in sports kits setting off on a run through the woods.

Where are you going to find a prep-school girl to be your first victim?

1121111213.content:
Following the service road down the side of the main buildings Jake quietly slipped behind a storage shed where he could survey the scene. He was starting to feel like a predator now as the girls he was watching were no longer just annoying rich girls who had always harassed him. Now they were potential meals.

He looked at them with new eyes as he assessed their potential to fill his belly. Some of them were irrelivent, being too young to eat. Others looked too tough as he wasn't exactly a giant for his age and he wasn't stupid.

But looking at the girls playing sports or doing their botany studies among the trees there was no shortage of potential bell fillers. He would just have to take his pick and be very careful not to get caught before he finished his meal.

He liked the look of the soccer players in their shorts and vests. Most of them were the right age but the only time they might be vulnerable would be when retrieving balls from the trees.

Then there were the runners who were following a winding track through the woods. He was sure he could ambush a meal among the trees.

But there were also the girls who were looking at the trees and the plants themselves. In their prep-school uniforms it would be a bit like unwrapping a present if he took one of those girls as he wouldn't know exactly what he had until he got hold of her.

So where is he going to try first?
1121111213.title: Get a girl from the sports fields

choices: Jake has sex with her first?
11211112133.content:
Thinking about his options Jake decides the girls wandering through the woods looking for bugs would be best. Unlike the athletes they were wandering off in ones and twos and only seemed to be paying attention to the ground at their feet. It should be easy to get close to one of these girls.

He spots a likely looking girl studying some tree bark and taking great care not to tread on a twig or make a noise he gets close. He likes the look of this one with long dark hair that almost reaches her waist and some nice curves he wonders what that hair will feel like going down his throat.

She looks familiar and just as he is about to pounce he remembers. She is his cousin's friend who he saw at a party last month. It had been her party and he remembers she was only 15. Disappointed that she is under-age he quietly backs away.

Jake was concentrating so hard on not being noticed by this girl that he didn't see the other girl until he tripped over her and they both fell into a soft bush.

"Sorry! I didn't see you." Jake couldn't stop his habit of apologising when anything happened around him but as he did so he realised that he was still laying on top of the girl.

"What are you doing here, in our school?" The girl was whispering and without thinking Jake followed suit.

"I was just looking for a friend, and I thought I'd found her." Jake fumbled the best lie he could manage and for an instant he thought that the girl might believe him, but then she grabbed his hand and looked at his mark.

"You're a predator aren't you?" She had him bang to rights but he wasn't sure he should admit it. With a scream she could bring down the wrath of twenty girl jocks down on him who could beat him to a pulp without breaking a sweat.
"I, um . . . " It was the best he could manage.

"Well I'm prey, see." She held out her own hand to show the mark.

Now he looked at her again, this time with the eyes of a predator assessing a potential meal.

Laying on her back she appeared to be his height. She had a cheeking look about her but with her hair tied back in pig-tails he was uncertain about whether she was legal. Certainly he had felt some padding on her when he fell on top of her so that had him thinking bust sizes that could mean some maturity. Well at least mature as far as a 13 year old boy was concerned.

"Do you want to eat me?" She thrust out her chest and even under her blouse he could see that she was wearing an actual bra and not just a training bra.

He hesitated, still unwilling to tell her the truth. He'd heard stories about what a pack a girls could do to a guy and didn't want to be kicked in the nuts but a whole team of soccer players.

"I'm Bethany by the way." She held out her hand and Jake froze for moment before he realised that he was supposed to shake it. This really wasn't how he'd expected things to go.

"I'm Jake, pleased to eat you." Jake suddenly realised what he'd said. She was going to scream for help he was sure of it. There was no way to keep her quiet and he was sure the athletes would capture him before he got very far if he made a run for it.

"Well Jake, I might be pleased to let you eat me. What do you say about that?"

Now Jake was really getting confused. This girl, Bethany, seemed willing to let him eat her. He was sure this was some kind of trick.

"I. I a, I think I would say thanks. Wouldn't I?" Jake couldn't believe that a girl would actually let herself be eaten by him.

"Of course there is a condition." Bethany sat up and brushed her fringe from her eyes. She waited and Jake realised that he was supposed to ask her.

He really wanted to know why she would want him to eat her but just knew that it would be the wrong question. He wasn't going to let his curiousity get in the way of his first ever meal.

"What is the condition Bethany?"

Well he had been expecting some kind of trick, some impossible condition. Instead her condition was that . . .

1313.content:
As the school day progresses, you get more and more glances in the halls by known predators of the school, you make your way through the day into fifth period, where your gym teacher Coach Lisa ruled over the class with an iron fist. She was a curvy woman in her mid thirties, and everyone knew that she was quite fond of her predatory powers over her students.

You walk on to the shiny hardtop where there is a classroom full of people who know it was your birthday, including the coach who was staring straight at you over the people gathered in the center of the room already. She motioned for you to come over to her as you followed, and approached the woman, wading your way through the crowd.

"Just know Dan, this will be your last period. I want you to go wait in my office until I come back." You regrettably follow her directions and make your way into the coaches office, and sit down on the ground, waiting for the doom which awaited.

You sit in antagonizing anticipation until
1313.title: No One, move on through the day

13133.content: You decide that this wan not going to be it, or at least you weren't going down without a fight that is. You get ready and tug open the door and sprint across the room, only to see the coach notice you and take off for her lunch. She shoved kids out of her way as you opened the door and
13133.title: The Great Escape

choices: Stay out in the forest, where it's safe
131331.content:
You ran like the wind. For as fat as she was from her prior meals, the Coach could not reach you. You made your way out of the building, and into the woods. Confident you lost her, you breathed a sigh of relief.

What do you do now?
131331.title: Made it to Safety

1313311.content:
You return to the building, unsure if you will make it outside again.

Upon re-entering, you find Hannah passing her way through the main lobby. As she walks past you, she looks at you, smiles evilly, and eyes you hungrily before proceeding.

What do you do?
1313311.title: Re-enter the school building

choices: You went in one way... And out the other...
134.content:
You remember it like it was yesterday.

You were seventeen years old. Senior year of high school. You had just pulled into the driveway of your high school, prepared to begin your day.

Right as you were to enter the school, however, you can remember her cold touch. Her long, pointy nails digging into your shoulders like daggers.

You remember her gleeful laugh as she pulled you away, overpowering you with her borderline superhuman strength.

You remember being lifted in the air, your yells being ignored.

You also remember sliding down her throat, landing in her stomach.

The soft, fleshy insides, so damp, so hot, uncomfortable.

You remember her soft, fast, repetitive heartbeat. Her various belly groans, the wet stomach floor. The fleshy coating to her stomach, that truly symbolized the prison you were trapped in.

You thought you could stay friends. You had broken up with her the day before. You lost the magic in your relationship, you argued with her day in, day out, she became overprotective - essentially tried to manipulate you and your friends, girls in particular, into staying away from one another so your attention would stay solely on her.

Yet, you don't even remember her seeming too disappointed when you broke up. You hugged, you agreed to stay friends, and you walked away feeling pretty happy to move on.

But you could never have imagined she would have done.... THIS.

You did say you endured the trial of her stomach, though. How did you do this?
134.title: Adam

14.content:
Pick your Prey Female. They are as followed:

Hellen: A 19 year-old basketball player. She's wicked on the court. However, she wants a boyfriend, but is too afraid he'll see her as prime steak. For that matter, her rival wants her gone. Will she endure, or be digested?

Dawn: A 16 year-old student. She's just been marked as Prey, and is terrified of some of her classmates. However, she has endured digestive acids before, but she fears it was just a fluke. Will she really be acid proof, or digest like good prey?

Misty: A 22 year-old college senior. She is studious and organized. She's been dating for sometime, and so far has avoided becoming part of the menu. However, her recent date has an interest in her delicious body, making her nervous. Will she survive the trials of dating?

Daisy: A 28 year-old college professor. She's recently been working out, and had drawn the attention of several of her staff. It doesn't help much when some of her students tease her about becoming their next meal. Will she make out okay, or will a student or fellow teacher give her the ultimate "fat burning" workout?

Ruby: A 21 year-old library page and college student. She tries to keep the peace in the library, but some of her regulars are hitting on her. However, she is unsure if they want to date her, or eat her.
14.title: Prey Female

142.content:
Dawn walked into class to find that most of her classmates had large bellies, even the teacher had a large stomach which see used to rest her hand on. Dawn sat down at her desk and looked around to see people eying her, but couldn't eat her due to class starting.
The three main people that worried dawn the most is her best friend, jasmine, the popular girl, jacky, and the teacher ms.robertson. Jasmine is hotter than dawn with blond hair, blue eyes, and cherry lips, also jasmine has always maintained her figue. Jacky is mean devouring whoever is lucky to be on her menu, she has brown hair and green eyes. Ms.roberson always had a tendency to devour anyone in class when she felt hungry, she has a large rack with black hair and chestnut eyes.
Class had gone smoothly until it got let out, as dawn is leaving an arm goes around her neck it is...
142.title: Dawn

1422.content:
"Sup dawn" said jasmine hugging dawn from behind, "you look nervous" also said jasmine.
"I am fine, i am nervous about being eaten, especially by you" said dawn, "that reminds me I have an idea, how I eat you and you can live with me in my belly" said jasmine. This shock dawn, making her look at Jasmine like she is crazy.
"That impossible, your belly will kill me" pointed out dawn, "no we can control our bellies make it so that we don't kill our occupants" said jasmine.
"Why haven't I heard of this" asked dawn, "nodody does it, always thinking with our stomachs" said Jasmine.
"Come it'll be fun, you, me together forever" said Jasmine, "you make it sound like your going to digest me" pointed out dawn.
"Sorry force of habit, used that line to eat a guy last week" said Jasmine, " speaking of eating a guy, what happens when you are hungry and want to eat somebody" asked dawn.
"I'll let you out, then eat them, or use my vagina" said Jasmine pointing down to her vagina, "eww" replied dawn.
"Hey it is nomal, I did it to a few girls" said Jasmine, "what do you think" she asked.
1422.title: Jasmine

14222.content:
"Ok, I'll do it if you promise not to digest me" said dawn, "alright get undress" said Jasmine.
"What, in the middle of the hall" asked dawn, "yes, nobody cares" said Jasmine crossing her arms. Dawn did as Jasmine said and got undress.
"Here Jasmine now get it over with" said dawn, "I always loved your body, soon it shall be in my belly" said Jasmine running up behind dawn and grabbing her boobs and fondling her vagina.
"Hey what are you doing" shirked dawn, "let me have fun before I have to lug you around where ever I go" said Jasmine quoting what she was doing.
"Ready" asked Jasmine, "just give me a mome.." said dawn as her head went into Jasmine's mouth.
Jasmine worked her way down dawn's body, quickly swallowing her. In thirty seconds Jasmine is at dawn's vagina and stuck her tongue in for a couple seconds before contuining on. Jasmine worked her way down dawn's smooth legs enjoying them as they slide down her throat. Very soon dawn's feet enter Jasmine mouth and start heading towards her waiting belly.
"Ahh you were so good, dawn" said Jasmine rubbing large beach ball size stomach, "what is going on I am being covered in acid" exclaimed dawn.
"Don't worry it is inert" said Jasmine heading towards next class.
14222.title: Yes

15.content: Here, for those who like a different twist, you'll find Furries here. They are as followed:
15.title: Furries Preds/Prey

151.content:
Here are the choices of Predatory Male Furries. They are as followed:

Wolfbane: An (obviously) 22 year-old wolf anthro. He loves to prowl around at night, and is the leader of his "pack." He's currenlty got a taste for some tasty females, but where to start?

Rolland: A 13 year-old fox anthro. He just became a licensed Pred, and is eager to try out his new-found hunting instincts. He's thinking about going after his older sister, who is a Prey fox anthro, but he has other targets in mind. Who will he go for?

Shadow: A 24 year-old bat anthro. Like Wolfbane, he loves to hunt at night. He's currently dating a fellow furry, but he wants to eat her as much as he wants to mate with her. What will he do?
151.title: Predatory Male Furry

152.content:
Here you'll find Predatory Female Furries. They are as followed:

Luna: A 19 year-old hyena anthro. While she has a strange sense of humor, she loves to hunt down easy prey. She's bit of a rebel. She currently targeting a handsome jackel anthro, but is unsure if she wants to mate or to devour him. You decide.

May: A 14 year-old cat anthro. She may have been a licened Pred for a year, but she is unsure how to be a good Pred. She involkes on her best friend, a mouse anthro, for help.

Izzy: A 22 year-old iguana anthro. She's a vain Pred, and often takes out girls who claim to be better than her. She currently seeking revenge against another anthro who humiliated her. Will she get her revenge or get distracted with tastier Prey?
152.title: Predatory Female Furry

1521.content:
"Damn this economy!" Luna said as she walked back to her apartment. The job interview, her third this week, had not gone well. At the first one, they had kicked her out for snacking on the receptionist. At the second, she soon realized that the job in question involved cameras and nudity. At the interview on that day, however, things had started off fairly well. June had worn casual clothes: faded jeans, a babydoll tee with a band logo on it, and an olive green stocking cap. Likewise, the job looked casual, but interesting, at a media store with easy access to and an employee discount on new albums from bands like "Gallbladder" and "Metal Candyland".

It was all going peachy until her potential employer, a human female with hoop earrings, asked about previous sales experience. Luna didn't have any. In fact, she had been caught shoplifting six times back home, and as luck would have it, the woman had heard about it.

And so, Luna walked home.
"No job, parents aren't sending more money, lousy grades..." she grumbled. "I wish things could take a turn for the better for once!" She stopped in front of the main door to the apartment complex and looked up and down the street slowly. Then, she saw him! A hunky jackel without a shirt on across the street in the old basketball court. She had met him last night at a rave but hadn't caught his phone number. He was playing basketball with several anthros and a couple humans. She ran her tongue along her bottom teeth thoughtfully. This could be a good opportunity...
1521.title: Luna

153.content:
Here's your choice of Prey Male Furries. They are as followed:

Joey: A 16 year-old rabbit anthro. After being legally marked as Prey, Joey is trying to stay alive. He's very temping, as many Preds have made it clear. Will he survive, or will he be on the menu for some hungry Pred?

Dexter: A 22 year-old bird anthro. He's bit of a book worm...er... bird. He spends most of his time reading books on how to survive. However, can he put that knowledge to the test in the real world?

Pierce: A 19 year-old hedgehog anthro. Pierce spends most of his time sleeping, only coming out at night for eating and excercise. He's a bit hard for some Preds to handle, thanks to his quils. However, will his primary defense fail him one day?
153.title: Prey Male Furry

154.content:
Here is a list of Prey Female Furries. Take your pick.

Amy: A 16 year-old mouse anthro. Now licensed as Prey, Amy spends most of her time hiding from potential Preds. She quick on her feet, enabling her a quick get-away. However, will her speed be enough?

Johanna: A 25 year-old lion anthro. She's managed to make it this far without being eaten. However, he soon-to-be mate is debating whether he should eat her or just mate with her. For that matter, a tiger anthro has had her eyes on Johanna for some time, and wants to get rid of her. Will Johanna surivive, or will she be put down?

Rosie: A 20 year-old jackel anthro. She's skittish and jumpy, and beats a quick retreat from Preds. However, she has here eyes on a potential mate, but is unsure if he sees the same way she see. You decide.
154.title: Prey Female Furry

info.brief_description: M/m, M/f, F/f, F/m, it's all fair game in this world.
info.description:
Welcome to a world where the stomach (and sometimes other parts) rule. In this world, Vore is an everyday thing. Males and females alike can gulp down their desired prey, in other words, other males and females. By law, a Predatory Male or Female must be marked with a star tattoo on the back of their right hand. Males are marked with a Blue Star, while Females are marked with a Yellow Star. Prey Males and Females are all marked with a Black "X" on the back of their left hand. All marks must be visible at all times. It is also law that Preds cannot swallow and digest other Preds, or underaged Prey. Preds must be marked on their 13th birthday, as that day is when they learn they can swallow Prey. On the 13th birthday of any young male or female, if he or she has predatory powers, they will wake up with an unhinged jaw, just like a snake. After dispaying this power to the Vore Leaders, they will be branded with the Star mark. However, if one wakes up on their 13th birthday with their jaw firmly attached, then they are considered Prey. However, even though the legal age for Preds is 13, the legal age for Prey is 16. Any Pred that violates the rule of either eating another Pred or eating an underaged Prey is punished by digestion. The marks also act like GPS's, keeping track of each marked individual. You can either take the fate of a powerful Pred, or try to survive each day as Prey. Good luck!

There are some guidlines that must be followed or posts will be deleted.
1) No one sentence posts. All posts must be at least one paragraph long.
2) Allowed vore: Soft, Oral, Unbirth, Cock, Breast, Anal, Digestion
3) Not Allowed vore: Hard, Absorbtion
4) No blood allowed, except the occasional tooth nick, and no scat, please.
5) Please use a word processor to check for spelling and grammer
6) If you are Prey, then you stay as Prey, likewise to Preds unless one breaks the rules.
7) If you are Prey and you're digested, that's it. No revival and no digestion resistance unless noted.
8) With the above statement, if one is acid proof, the whole factor is based on luck. In short, you may be resistant for one stomach, but not for a different one.

Other than that, go nuts! ^_^
